snippet.title: Riddled Corpses trailer launch
snippet.description:
Download game Available now!!:
link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/369890/

Riddled Corpses is arcade game 8/16bits. we will have hordes of zombies and all kinds of monsters, all created with love pixel art.

I would like to have 6 stage for this game,very different from each other, as a city or a desert.
each scenario will have new enemies, but all related to the zombied.
this game is hard... 

steam link:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=386786660
